description: From French médiéval (“medieval”), from Latin medium (“middle”) + aevum (“age”).

adjectives.description: medieval (comparative more medieval, superlative most medieval)

entries.meaning: Of or relating to the Middle Ages, the period from approximately 500 to 1500 AD.

definitionGroups.group: Having characteristics associated with the Middle Ages in popular, modern cultural perception:

entries.meaning: Someone living in the Middle Ages.
A medieval example (of something aforementioned or understood from context).
examples: Thank God for modern remedies: the medievals were often useless or even harmful.
